name: Global Strike
description:
Get ready to engage in an epic battle in Global Strike! With the world at war, it's up to you to conquer enemies, secure resources, and become the champion. With four maps to choose from, you can play in single-player mode or go head-to-head with players from all over the world in real-time multiplayer mode.

Whether you're a fan of strategy, action, or simulation, Global Strike has something for everyone. Deploy your navy to conquer the seas or build powerful silos and airports to stun your enemies into submission. Plan a late-game push by developing powerful infrastructure. Combine all three to become the ultimate Global Strike champion!

Global Strike is free to download and play. For any questions or technical support, please contact us at support@appwireinc.com. Are you ready to lead your forces to glory?
